channel.title: Travel on Chmouel's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Chmouel's blog

item.title: TFL.GOV.UK and mozilla quick search
item.description: If you want to bookmark aÂ quick mozilla search from your house to another postcode you can use this URI : http://journeyplanner.tfl.gov.uk/user/XSLT_TRIP_REQUEST2?language=en&sessionID=0&type_destination=locator&name_destination=DESTINATION_POSTCODE&type_origin=locator&name_origin=ORIGIN_POSTCODE&place_origin=London&place_destination=London just change the DESTINATION and ORIGIN_POSTCODE to %s if you like or make it as static bookmark.

item.title: Generating md5 encrypted password for chpasswd
item.description: If you want to generate properly encrypted password to feed to chpasswd, the most easier and proper way is to do that from command line : [code lang=“bash”] echo “encryptedpassword”|openssl passwd -1 -stdin [/code] If you want to generate in pure python you can do it like that : [code lang=“python”] def md5crypt(password, salt, magic=’$1$’): import md5 m = md5.new() m.update(password + magic + salt) # /* Then just as many characters of the MD5(pw,salt,pw) */
